## Source: ossf-package-analysis (93108c8da3931417e2009ddb17d45ffd86062e129a805a7ff62f3361780fd2d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'formatjs-internal-intl' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
